scripts.build:dryrun: pnpm --filter @stateforge-framework/core run build && pnpm --filter @stateforge/cli run build && pnpm --filter @stateforge-framework/starter run build:dryrun
scripts.release:core:patch: node scripts/bootstrap-npmrc.js && node scripts/prepare-core-publish.js && cd packages/core && npm version patch && pnpm install --lockfile-only && pnpm build && npm publish --access=restricted --registry=https://npm.pkg.github.com --legacy-peer-deps --force
scripts.release:core:minor: node scripts/bootstrap-npmrc.js && cd packages/core && npm version minor && pnpm install --lockfile-only && pnpm build && npx npm@latest publish --access=restricted --registry=https://npm.pkg.github.com --legacy-peer-deps --force
scripts.release:core:major: node scripts/bootstrap-npmrc.js && cd packages/core && npm version major && pnpm install --lockfile-only && pnpm build && npx npm@latest publish --access=restricted --registry=https://npm.pkg.github.com --legacy-peer-deps --force
scripts.release:core:patch:flow: pnpm release:core:patch && node scripts/use-published-core.js && pnpm install
scripts.release:core:minor:flow: pnpm release:core:minor && node scripts/use-published-core.js && pnpm install
scripts.release:core:major:flow: pnpm release:core:major && node scripts/use-published-core.js && pnpm install
